menu_item_data.name: Daal Bhat Tarkari
menu_item_data.description:
A vegan favorite, this menu features Chana Masala, a hearty chickpea curry, alongside Saag Tareko, fresh pak choi saut√©ed with turmeric and jeera. It also includes Mustang Alu, potato wedges seasoned with Szechuan pepper and Jimbu, and Daal, the traditional lentil soup which is the staple food of the Himalayas.
The meal is served with papad, salad, rice, and Alu Achar, a potato-sesame salad.
Enjoy a complimentary cup of tea when you dine in traditional Nepalese style by eating with your hand

menu_item_data.name: Mitho Cha Experience
menu_item_data.description:
For the starter, enjoy a Mixed Momo platter with 2 pieces each of Vegan, Paneer, and Chicken Momos, served with 2 different chutneys.
The main course is our Mitho Cha Thali, a curated selection of Daal Bhat specialties including Chicken Curry, Khasi Saag, Mustang Alu, Chana Masala, Vegetable Curry, Daal, and Spinach, served with salad, rice, and papadams.
To finish, the dessert is Shikarni ‚Äì two small bowls of yogurt blended with cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves, topped with nuts and a Gulab Jamun.

menu_item_data.name: Daal Bhat Masu
menu_item_data.description:
The Classic features a rich Chicken Curry alongside Khasi Saag, a lamb and spinach stew cooked with Himalayan spices. It also includes Mustang Alu, potato wedges seasoned with Szechuan pepper and Jimbu, and Daal, the traditional lentil soup which is the staple food of the Himalayas.
The meal is served with papad, salad, rice, and Alu Achar, a potato-sesame salad.
Enjoy a complimentary cup of tea when you dine in traditional Nepalese style by eating with your hands!
